title: Amazon Basics Cat Litter Box with Lid, No-Mess, Standard, unisex, Charcoal, 26 in x 23 in x 20 in
description: Designed for increased privacy, this covered litter box offers a hooded enclosure that meets the natural instincts of cats who prefer a little extra seclusion. Made from high-quality, stain and odor-resistant plastic, this covered litter box for indoor cats effectively minimizes unpleasant odors with its pre-installed replaceable carbon filter, allowing a reduced cat smell litter box environment. The cover is equipped with a functional carrying handle, allowing easy removal for litter scooping or changing. Its swinging plastic door provides easy access for cats, while keeping litter contained, making it an ideal kitty litter box. Measuring 21 x 16 x 15 inches, this litter box with top is ideal for any indoor setting. As a comprehensive solution for cat litter & housebreaking, this cat box fits effortlessly into your living space.
